DOC.brief_summary: The investigator perform 4-week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled human trial evaluate efficacy safety Heme-Iron Polypeptide Improvement Anemia . The investigator measure Improvement Anemia parameter , include hemoglobin , transferrin saturation , serum iron , ferritin , monitor blood pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Heme-Iron Polypeptide Improvement Anemia
DOC.criteria: Males female 1960 year old Hemoglobin concentration le 13g/dL ( men ) , 12g/dL ( woman ) Able give inform consent Allergic hypersensitive ingredient test product History reaction test product gastrointestinal disease Crohn 's disease gastrointestinal surgery Participation clinical trial within past 2 month History alcohol substance abuse Laboratory test , medical psychological condition deem investigator interfere successful participation study Pregnant lactate woman etc .
